examples: The house rules are crystal clear.
The teacher ruled the classroom with a heavy hand, rarely allowing any freedom or creativity.
She explained the rules of the game to the new players.
In this particular society men rule the roost and women have a low status and few rights.
The new rules should help cut the red tape for farmers.
words.defineEn: an instruction that says what is or is not allowed in a given situation or while playing a game
words.defineVi: một hướng dẫn cho biết những gì được phép hoặc không được phép trong một tình huống nhất định hoặc trong khi chơi trò chơi

examples: Share your thoughts with other people.
The thought drove him to despair.
I gave the matter a lot of thought.
I gave a lot of thought to the matter.
Excuse me, I lost my train of thoughts.
words.defineEn: something that comes to one's mind, such as, an idea, image, etc.
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó xuất hiện trong tâm trí của một người, chẳng hạn như một ý tưởng, hình ảnh, v.v.

examples: In 2018 the party had 10 000 members.
That party was off the hook!
The party continued into the wee small hours.
The party is on Friday evening.
But the party was over all too quickly for little Nicole.
words.defineEn: an event where people get together and enjoy themselves by talking, dancing, eating, drinking, etc.
words.defineVi: một sự kiện nơi mọi người gặp nhau và tận hưởng bằng cách nói chuyện, khiêu vũ, ăn, uống, v.v.

examples: He takes size 5 boots.
The family has grown in size recently.
What size shoes do you take?
Tortelloni's substantial size makes them a better choice compared to the bite-sized tortellini.
Of course we'll change it for a larger size, Madam.
words.defineEn: how small or big something is; the amount of something
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó nhỏ hay lớn như thế nào; số lượng của một cái gì đó

examples: More conservative candidates are losing ground in key battleground states.
As a health-conscious individual, he sprinkled ground flaxseed over his morning yogurt.
The company is gaining ground rapidly with its new product launch.
Her skirt almost reached the ground.
The grounds covered eight acres.
words.defineEn: the surface layer of Earth that is solid and people walk on
words.defineVi: lớp bề mặt của Trái đất rắn chắc và mọi người đi bộ trên

examples: Our ship changed course.
The course gives you a bird's eye view of European art history.
The guidance system keeps the machine on course.
The college runs summer courses for foreign students.
The ship is holding a south-easterly course.
words.defineEn: a series of lessons or lectures on a particular subject
words.defineVi: một loạt các bài học hoặc bài giảng về một chủ đề cụ thể

examples: This business method takes the risk of failure out of the table.
Adults were also at risk from epidemics.
Any investment involves an element of risk.
All personal belongings are left at the owner’s risk.
He risked his life to save his daughter from the fire.
words.defineEn: the possibility of something dangerous or unpleasant happening in the future; a situation that causes danger or problem
words.defineVi: khả năng xảy ra điều gì đó nguy hiểm hoặc khó chịu trong tương lai; một tình huống gây ra nguy hiểm hoặc vấn đề

examples: Opportunity makes a thief.
Many investors have turned their attention to opportunities abroad.
Both teams chanced their arms at every opportunity.
The system allows people the opportunity to browse a wide selection of books.
He had the opportunity to learn English in Australia.
words.defineEn: a situation or a chance where doing or achieving something particular becomes possible or easier
words.defineVi: một tình huống hoặc một cơ hội mà làm hoặc đạt được điều gì đó cụ thể trở nên có thể hoặc dễ dàng hơn

examples: Keep your hair on.
Her hair reaches down to her waist.
His hair reached down to the middle of his back.
My grandmother's hair is gray.
Short hair really becomes you.
words.defineEn: the thin thread-like things that grow on our head
words.defineVi: những thứ giống như sợi chỉ mọc trên đầu chúng ta

examples: Health services are lining the drug companies’ pockets, according to the report.
Mr. Perkins took the morning service.
Customer service calls went unanswered.
The local bus company only runs a skeleton service on Sundays.
The congregation gathered around the altar for the morning service.
words.defineEn: the work done by a person, organization, company, etc. for the benefit of others
words.defineVi: công việc được thực hiện bởi một người, tổ chức, công ty, v.v. vì lợi ích của người khác

examples: Parents often support their children financially during college.
His parents footed the bill for his college education.
My parents always took an interest in my hobbies.
My parents enjoyed a delicious calamari appetizer at the seaside restaurant.
My parents always drink orange juice for breakfast.
words.defineEn: our mother or our father
words.defineVi: mẹ của chúng tôi hoặc cha của chúng tôi

examples: Did your friend ask for permission to use the image?
The company is trying to create a young energetic image.
Many women feel pressure to maintain a youthful appearance as they age due to the harmful stereotype that 'a woman is as old as she looks', which can lead to body image issues and low self-esteem.
Images are captured in black and white to save hard disk space.
The photographer ventured into remote landscapes, capturing stunning images of untouched nature in the raw, free from any human intervention.
words.defineEn: a representation of something, such as a person, object, or scene, created with a medium such as a photograph, painting, or drawing
words.defineVi: một đại diện của một cái gì đó, chẳng hạn như một người, đối tượng hoặc cảnh, được tạo bằng phương tiện như ảnh, tranh hoặc bản vẽ

examples: Check the box next to the right answer.
We label our boxes with permanent markers for easy identification.
A large cardboard box will serve the purpose.
The chicken laid an egg in the nesting box.
They pushed the heavy box across the room.
words.defineEn: a container made of wood, thick card, metal, etc. with a flat base and sides, often square or rectangular and having a lid
words.defineVi: một hộp làm bằng gỗ, thẻ dày, kim loại, v.v. có đế và các mặt phẳng, thường là hình vuông hoặc hình chữ nhật và có nắp

examples: Alice's song hits the airwaves.
That song always sends a shiver down my spine.
Fans have given the band's new song their seal of approval.
That band's new song is really off the hook!
She bought the painting for a song.
words.defineEn: a piece of music that has words
words.defineVi: một bản nhạc có lời

examples: Eggs are a great source of protein.
The chicken laid an egg in the nesting box.
The eggs cook quickly in a hot frying pan.
I wanted bacon and eggs for breakfast.
The brunch special featured a beefburger with a sunny-side-up egg, crispy bacon, and a dollop of hollandaise sauce.
words.defineEn: an oval or round thing that is produced by a chicken and can be used for food
words.defineVi: một thứ hình bầu dục hoặc tròn được sản xuất bởi một con gà và có thể được sử dụng cho thực phẩm

examples: Its skin feels really smooth.
The bite had scarcely broken the skin.
The bite had scarcely broken the skin.
The milk skin gives a unique texture to the homemade pudding.
The crispy skin of the parson's nose offered a satisfying crunch with each bite.
words.defineEn: the thin layer of tissue that covers the body of a person or an animal
words.defineVi: lớp mô mỏng bao phủ cơ thể của một người hoặc động vật

examples: The interviewer asked me a series of questions during the job interview.
The wacky series has been on the air for ten years.
It makes light work of a complex process thanks to a series of easy-to-use wizards.
The magician performed a series of tricks, and surprisingly, the rabbit appeared out of thin air.
Our graphic designer really carved out a niche for himself with that series of innovative ads.
words.defineEn: a group of similar events, things, or people coming one after the other
words.defineVi: một nhóm các sự kiện, sự vật hoặc con người tương tự lần lượt xuất hiện

examples: The plan ran into a brick wall.
Small cracks appeared in the wall.
She decorated the walls of her bedroom with pictures and posters.
He's bouncing off the walls.
The artwork on the wall was a mix of colors and textures.
words.defineEn: an upright structure, usually made of brick, concrete, or stone that is made to divide, protect, or surround a place
words.defineVi: một cấu trúc thẳng đứng, thường được làm bằng gạch, bê tông hoặc đá được tạo ra để phân chia, bảo vệ hoặc bao quanh một nơi

examples: The TV quiz was more fun than a barrel of monkeys!
The colorful bowtie pasta added a fun twist to the classic mac and cheese dish.
He sounds about as much fun as a wet weekend in Carmarthenshire.
I had so much fun at the family reunion.
The fans had fun and got their money's worth.
words.defineEn: the feeling of enjoyment or amusement
words.defineVi: cảm giác thích thú hoặc giải trí

examples: During this period the movies really came of age as an art form.
The make-or-break factor in this delicate post-course period is the attitude of the person's immediate superior.
Car-rental companies are running background checks on drivers who rent for long periods.
It’s time to close the book on this unfortunate period in our history.
A place that lets them be for whatever period they choose.
words.defineEn: a duration of time
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian

examples: The mother gently cradled her newborn baby in her arms.
My mother pickled radishes with vinegar and spices.
My mother throws that far away.
This picture shows my mother as a young woman.
My mother has blue eyes and black hair.
words.defineEn: a child's female parent
words.defineVi: cha mẹ của một đứa trẻ

examples: Fathers play a crucial role in their children's upbringing and development.
My father pays his bills at the beginning of the month.
My father has brown eyes.
Her father kept a grocer's shop.
My father always had a lead foot.
words.defineEn: a child's male parent
words.defineVi: cha mẹ nam của một đứa trẻ

examples: Technology advances by fits and starts.
Each technology has its pros and cons.
Current drilling technology thus barely scrapes the surface.
Our superior technology is our ace in the hole.
We lead the way in space technology.
words.defineEn: scientific knowledge put into practice in a particular area, especially in industry
words.defineVi: kiến thức khoa học đưa vào thực tiễn trong một lĩnh vực cụ thể, đặc biệt là trong ngành công nghiệp

examples: Not paying attention.
The colorful fish in the aquarium captured my attention.
Many investors have turned their attention to opportunities abroad.
No one paid them any attention.
The British Royal Family attracts a lot of attention from around the world.
words.defineEn: the act of taking notice of someone or something
words.defineVi: hành động chú ý đến ai đó hoặc cái gì đó

examples: Every age has its book, after all.
Boys his age are a law unto themselves.
Reckless youth makes rueful age.
His parents have not yet reached retirement age.
My parents came of age during the 1960s.
words.defineEn: the number of years something has existed or someone has been alive
words.defineVi: số năm một cái gì đó đã tồn tại hoặc một ai đó đã được sống
